HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: DPD: 69 Kč (free for orders over 1500 Kč). PPL: 109 Kč (free for orders over 1500 Kč).
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: DPD: usually the next working day for orders placed before 18:00. PPL: 1-3 working days.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.pricing: Osobní odběr na pobočce (Click & Collect): 49 Kč. Rezervace na prodejně (Reserve in store): ZDARMA.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The store offers home delivery and two types of in-store pickup (Click & Collect and free reservation).
PROVIDERS: Home delivery is handled by DPD and PPL.
PRICING: Home delivery costs 69 Kč (DPD) or 109 Kč (PPL), with free shipping on orders over 1500 Kč. In-store pickup (Click & Collect) costs 49 Kč, while in-store reservation is free.
DELIVERY TIMES: DPD typically delivers the next working day, while PPL takes 1-3 working days. Deliveries are made on working days only.
NOTABLE FEATURES: A key feature is the free in-store reservation service, allowing customers to pick up items within 60 minutes. The free shipping threshold is 1500 Kč for all home delivery options.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented clearly on a dedicated page. It covers the available methods, providers, pricing, and delivery times effectively. However, it lacks information on COD surcharges, weekend delivery, and options for parcel shops or lockers, which are common in the Czech market.
